amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent funds from being used to treat the New Mexico Meadow Jumping Mouse as an endangered species.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 60 printed in House Report 115-830 to prevent funds from being used to treat the New Mexico Meadow Jumping Mouse as an endangered species.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 209 (Roll no. 353).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 209 (Roll no. 353).
